00016 Text::Text ()
00017     :   content_(std::string("")),
00018         wordRates_(std::vector<WordRate>(0))
00019 {
00020     // Build the appearance rate of every word in text
00021     computeWordRates();
00022 };

00028 Text::Text (const std::string &content) : content_(content), wordRates_(std::vector<WordRate>(0))
00029 {
00030     // Build the appearance rate of every word in text
00031     computeWordRates();
00032 };

00040 void Text::addCharacter (const char &character, const unsigned int &position)
00041 {
00042     if(position > content_.length())
00043         content_.append(1, character);
00044     else
00045     {
00046         if (position < 0)
00047             content_.insert(0, 1, character);
00048         else
00049             content_.insert(position, 1, character);
00050     }
00051     
00052     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00053     computeWordRates();
00054 };
00055 
00056 
00060 void Text::addCharacter (const char &character)
00061 {
00062     // Call the generic 'addCharacter' function
00063     addCharacter(character, content_.length());
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00071 void Text::removeCharacter (const unsigned int &position)
00072 {
00073     if (position > content_.length())
00074         content_.erase(content_.end());
00075     else
00076     {
00077         if ( position < 0 )
00078             content_.erase(content_.begin());
00079         else
00080             content_.erase(position, 1);
00081     }
00082     
00083     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00084     computeWordRates();
00085 };
00086 
00087 
00091 void Text::updateWordRate (const std::string &word)
00092 {
00093     // Searches the word in the vector
00094     std::vector<WordRate>::iterator wordRates;
00095     for (wordRates = wordRates_.begin(); wordRates not_eq wordRates_.end(); ++wordRates)
00096     {
00097         // Updates its appearance rate
00098         if ( (*wordRates).first == word )
00099         {
00100             (*wordRates).second++;
00101             return;
00102         }
00103     }
00104     
00105     // The word was not stored, so here we adds its first appearance
00106     wordRates_.push_back(WordRate(word, 1));
00107 };
00108 
00109 
00114 void Text::computeWordRates ()
00115 {
00116     std::vector<std::string> words; // Vector to hold our words after removing spaces
00117     
00118     // Extract the words in text
00119     tokenize(words);
00120     
00121     // Update appearance rate of every word extracted
00122     std::vector<std::string>::iterator wordsIterator;
00123     for (wordsIterator = words.begin(); wordsIterator not_eq words.end(); ++wordsIterator)
00124         updateWordRate(*wordsIterator);
00125         
00126     // This sorting will improve future lookups
00127     std::sort (wordRates_.begin(), wordRates_.end());
00128 };
00129 
00130 
00134 void Text::tokenize(std::vector<std::string>& tokens, const std::string& delimiters) const
00135 {
00136     // Skip delimiters at the beginning of text
00137     std::string::size_type lastPos = content_.find_first_not_of(delimiters, 0);
00138     
00139     // Find the first "non-delimiter"
00140     std::string::size_type pos     = content_.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00141     
00142     // Traverse the content until reaching its end
00143     while ( (std::string::npos not_eq pos) or (std::string::npos not_eq lastPos) )
00144     {
00145         // A word has been found, add it to the vector
00146         tokens.push_back(content_.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos));
00147         
00148         // Skip delimiters again
00149         lastPos = content_.find_first_not_of(delimiters, pos);
00150         
00151         // Find the next "non-delimiter"
00152         pos = content_.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00153     }
00154 };
